featured.text: Chains have emerged in Taiwan, Singapore, and even on resort islands like Bali.

definition.zh_def: 巴厘島，印尼的一個島嶼，以其美麗的海灘、文化和旅遊景點而聞名。
definition.en_def: Bali, an island in Indonesia known for its beautiful beaches, culture, and tourist attractions.
definition.example: Many tourists visit Bali every year to enjoy its stunning landscapes and vibrant culture.
